thread.section_title: BlueSun Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BlueSun Vacations | bluesunvacations.com | 9 of 47
thread.title: Jeff

author: Jeff
title: Jeff
text: Thoroughly enjoyed my experience with BlueSun Vacations (specifically Shane Benson). Shane worked hard and communicated well to find us multiple options in our price range for our honeymoon. He found us much better deals on better resorts than we were able to find anywhere else. Couldn't say enough about Shane and our BlueSuns experience and look forward to working with them on many more vacations in the future.
